question: Where can one find trending text generation models on the Hugging Face platform?
response: To find popular or trending text generation models on the Hugging Face Hub, you can visit [https://huggingface.co/models?pipeline_tag=text-generation&sort=trending](https://huggingface.co/models?pipeline_tag=text-generation&sort=trending). This link directly filters the models on the Hugging Face Hub to show those tagged for text generation and sorted by trending.
